name: Joust
description: Joust - casual slasher of knightly tournaments. Competition among players for the maximum passage of levels. Playing on the side of the Vikings or knights, boss fights. Become the best player in the world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Vista/8/10 Processor: 2.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon 46XX / NVIDIA GeForce GT 520 (DirectX 10.1 level video card and drivers, The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit /Vista 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or higher, AMD Radeon series 77XX or higher (DirectX 11 level video card and drivers) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
